name: Out of Space to Run
description:
My entry (that I didn't manage to upload in time) for Epic Game Jam 2021.

It's a split-screen 1v1 game inspired by Tron. 

To play it's necessary to have controller connected, as Player 2 can be only controlled this way.

Cycles can be controlled by either turning 90 degrees or by swerwing right and left. They can also jump but won't be controllable during it.

Last one standing wins. Additional lose condition except hitting wall is to go out of red zone (it shrinks over time.) 

Controls: 

Keyboard: Left - A; Right - D; Swerve L - Z; Swerve R - X; Jump - Spacebar; Boost - Left Shift

Controller: Left/Right - D-pad; Swerve - Left Stick; Jump - South Button; Boost - Right Trigger
